title: 'I can breathe again' says Israeli hostage held for nearly 500 days in Gaza
summary_full: In his first international interview, Sasha Troufanov tells the BBC how he thought he would die in captivity after he was taken hostage on 7 October 2023.
summary_public: In his first international interview, Sasha Troufanov tells the BBC how he thought he would die in captivity after he was taken hostage on 7 October 2023.

IL.label: neutral
IL.evidence: Israeli hostage held for nearly 500 days in Gaza
